definition: to dismiss from office/to ban/to reject
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
Dismiss the hundred schools, revere only the Confucian (idiom)/sole dominant ideology
pinyin: ba4 chu4 bai3 jia1 , du2 zun1 ru2 shu4

sentences.english: Images of Gadhafi's fiery defiance flashed in the face of ouster.
sentences.chinese: 卡扎菲暴躁蔑視的圖像，面對罷黜在不斷地閃爍着。
